description: [AADInternals](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0677) can execute commands on Azure virtual machines using the VM agent.(Citation: AADInternals Root Access to Azure VMs)

external_references.description: Dr. Nestori Syynimaa. (2020, June 4). Getting root access to Azure VMs as a Azure AD Global Administrator. Retrieved March 13, 2023.
external_references.source_name: AADInternals Root Access to Azure VMs
